channel.title: ProSiebenSat.1 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in ProSiebenSat.1 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Berlusconi’s MFE Ups Takeover Offer for Germany’s ProSiebenSat.1
item.description: MFE wants to add Germany’s number 2 commercial broadcaster to its pan-European network that already includes Italy’s Mediaset and Spain’s Telecinco.
